title: 249: The Hunt for the Chicago Strangler: Part 2
itunes:title: The Hunt for the Chicago Strangler: Part 2
description:
Citizen detectives make the shocking discovery that there may be as many as THREE ACTIVE SERIAL KILLERS on the loose in Chicago. As women continue to die, a killer in a neighboring state sheds some light on how the Chicago killings are being carried out--and how the killers are getting away with it.

PATRICK IS HITTING THE ROAD WITH SUPER HOT HUSBAND STEVE! We're covering "Class Action Park" and we're coming to Minneapolis, Dallas, and Houston NEXT WEEK!! GET YOUR TICKETS HERE!!
